The goal of oxyQ is to to aid in quality checking raw sonde sampling data and 
to provide helpful functions for the monitoring of oxygenation plants.


## Installation

You can install the development version of oxyQ from [GitHub](https://github.com/dbca-wa) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("dbca-wa/oxyQ", build_vignettes = TRUE)
```

Be sure to check out the package vignette for how to get started.

```r
utils::browseVignettes(package = "oxyQ)
```
